request.description: Creates all predefined pages in the system. Admin only operation. Safe to call multiple times (idempotent).

request.description: Retrieves page content with translations and sections for a specific page type and language.

variable.description: Type of page (HOME, ABOUT, HOW_IT_WORKS, etc.)

request.description: Retrieves page content for a specific language. Includes translations and sections.
Updates page translation for a specific language. Admin only operation.
Retrieves SEO metadata for a specific page in the requested language.
Updates SEO metadata for a specific page in the specified language. Admin only operation.

formdata.description: Media type (blog_thumbnail, blog_cover, section_hero, section_content, author_profile)

request.description:
Deletes a media file from storage. The URL must be provided as a query parameter and must be URL-encoded.

Example URL before encoding:
https://storage.googleapis.com/scoretrend/blog/thumbnails/example.webp

Example encoded URL:
https%3A%2F%2Fstorage.googleapis.com%2Fscoretrend%2Fblog%2Fthumbnails%2Fexample.webp
Retrieves the author details for the currently authenticated user.
Updates the author details for the currently authenticated user.
